name: Jelly & Toast
description:
Jelly & Toast is a cooperative local game that puts players in the roles of Jelly and Toast on an epic mission to recover stolen magical ingredients from the sinister mercenary corporation that threatens their bakery. Embark on this thrilling adventure where the kitchen becomes the battlefield.

  • You can play it solo or co-op!


  • You can throw boxes or your friends, what matters is the result!


  • Explore three different types of kitchens filled with culinary challenges!
